title.rendered: Luxe Interiors and Design New York features Infinite Artisan Fire Bowl

content.rendered: Written for affluent homeowners to showcase luxury residential architecture, design, interiors and products, Luxe Interiors and Design features Eldorado Stone’s Infinite Artisan Fire Bowl in the July 2015 issue. Displayed under “Must Haves,” the image author shares that the elegant shape of the fire bowl will naturally draw attention for its style and inviting warmth.
